mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract_chat (home_id, owner_id, buyer_id, contract_start_at, last_message, status) VALUES (#{homeId}, #{ownerId}, #{buyerId}, #{contractStartAt}, #{lastMessage}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE contract_chat SET status = CASE WHEN status = 'ROUND0' THEN 'ROUND1' WHEN status = 'ROUND1' THEN 'ROUND2' WHEN status = 'ROUND2' THEN 'ROUND3' ELSE status END WHERE contract_chat_id = #{contractChatId}
